name: CatholicNews
0:
”Alexa, open catholic news”
”Alexa, ask catholic news for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start catholic news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic news
des: A daily news briefing from Catholic News Agency, powered by artificial intelligence. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
